item.description:
March's event will be a SATURDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: Gimme some Love

This is inspired by a question Mary brought up in January. To be blunt, where's the sex? A lot of Golden Age SF leaves it out. Heck, a large portion of it left out the women! (But let's not go there.) Surely in this enlightened age, SF writers are remembering that grown-ups like other grown-ups in many ways. There are lot more books out there to go through, so let's help each figure this one out.

Challenge: Find an example of Science Fiction book or short story that addresses love, romance, or plain old sex in a grown-up manner. If you can't, find something from another genre, or even (gasp!) a literary novel, that would serve as a worthy model.

Agenda:

4:00 Names.

Topic: Gimme some Love


5:00 Break
Open Discussions

6:00 Go Home and Write!
